title: You've changed
brief_description: From the time he was awarded a Churchill Fellowship in 1969, Conrad’s life has been one of achievement. A skilled builder, a respected intellect and an icon in forestry aviation, Conrad now needs full-time care due to dementia. Created as part of ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ in association with Vic Health and the Alzheimer’s Association.
